name: Monster Shooter (itch) (JiukOn)
description:
This is a game developed in JAVA with the intention of learning. ----- Controls ----- In the menu: W, S OR UP, DOWN - Control of the options shown. Enter - to choose the option. In the game: W, S, A, D or UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT - Control the movement of the character. P - Pause game. Enter - to choose the option in pause screen. 0 - Save Game. On the game over screen: Space - to restart the game.

V0.2

-----------------------

Supported system:

Windows
